Requires a Watcher-only Intellect 14 and Resolve 15 check. | guid = 5894e353-1ade-4ce2-8ffd-84b8f68af52a }} [290px](/filePoe2SketchGulfarycPng/) '''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a [soulbound](/soulbound/) {{lc:Mace}} in {{poe2}}. It can only be bound to a [Cipher](/cipher/), [Fighter](/fighter/), or [Monk](/monk/). ## Description As with other [soulbound weapon{{!}}soulbound weapons](/soulboundWeaponSoulboundWeapons/) the in-game description of Magistrate's Cudgel is only gradually revealed. The description starts as follows, and more is added each time the weapon is upgraded by fulfilling specific requirements as detailed below. ###### Base {{Description |{{#var:description}}}} ###### Level 1 {{Description|"...and let it be known be that all who assume the position of Magistrate of the Court of the Empire of Aedyr shall be given at their start of term the enclosed cudgel bearing the grave visage of our most beloved Ferscönyng (LMHR), and that all in possession of the aforementioned cudgel shall have, by divine authority, leave to enact justice upon the face of the petitioners in their court..."}} ###### Level 2 {{Description|"...and let it be known that execution by cudgel, while permitted at the Magistrate's preference, is not endorsed per se by the Court, unless the petitioner in question has been found guilty of crimes most heinous, such as those involving the misapplication of animancy or rebellion against the Imperial Throne..."}} ###### Level 3 {{Description|"...and let it be known, finally, that the Magistrate and their staff are strictly forbidden use of the cudgel for unsanctioned acts, and that no exceptions shall be made except at the sole discretion of our most beloved Ferscönyng (LMHR)"}} ## Acquisition {{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}} ## Soulbound upgrades {| class="wikitable sortable" !
